title: Homework
text:
[ x ] - load saved notes from database and display on page.
[ x ] - click 'pencil' icon to create a new note.
[ x ] -  click 'save' icon to update database with a new note or an edited note.
[ x ] - click 'delete' icon to remove an a note.
[ x ] - refactor code.
[ x ] - add missing comments to code.
[ x ] - submit assignment.
